short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Robust Sales Efficiency Platform, Built with Intelligence

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Amplify10 (formerly known as Featurewave) is an AI-powered sales enablement platform that delivers contextual just-in-time guidance to ensure that your team is enabled to be your customer's trusted advisor.

This chrome extension allows integration of Featurewave to content management system and file repository.
